downloadDescription: Live Meeting administrators can use this intranet site template to instantly create an internal resource site for Live Meeting.
detailsSection: Microsoft Office Live Meeting 2007 Intranet-In-A-Box is a site template that administrators can use to instantly create an intranet resource site for Live Meeting. This template includes links to support, training, account creation, and conference center log-in. Additionally, administrators can easily customize this site by adding best practices,  and company policies and procedures.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office program:
    • Microsoft Office Live Meeting
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

Save the zipped file to a directory on your computer.

Instructions for use:

After you save the file, unzip the file as you typically would.

To remove this download:

Delete the files from the directory where you saved them.
